selftimer: Yes, 2 s, 5 s, 10 s, 20 s; from 1 to 9 images
recordingformat: NEF (RAW): 14-bit compression, JPEG-Baseline compliant with JPEG;compression settings for fine (about 1: 4), normal (about 1: 8) and basic (about 1: 16) compression NEF (RAW) + JPEG
supportedmemorycards: SD (Secure Digital), SDHC, and SDXC memory cards
flashmode: Auto, Portrait, Child, Close-up, Night Portrait, Party / interior, pet portrait, color sketch: Auto flash mode with auto pop-up P, S, A, M, Food: Manual pop-up with button
iso: ISO 100 - 6400 in steps of 1/3 EV. You can also set at approximately 0.3, 0.7, 1 or 2 EV (ISO 25 600) of ISO 6400; available automatic ISO sensitivity setting
lcddisplay: moving, low-temperature polysilicon LCD TFT with a resolution of about 921 thousand. dots (VGA), approximately 100 percent frame coverage, and brightness adjustment
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all with fine tuning except preset manual.
